qas.question: Name two districts with good night life?
What is the home of the orchestra?

answers.text: Kimmel Center for the Performing Arts

qas.question: What is the countries oldest opera house?

answers.text: Opera Company of Philadelphia and the Pennsylvania Ballet

qas.question: What is the oldest theater in the U.S.?

context: Areas such as <a0_0>South Street and Old City<a0_0/> have a vibrant night life. The Avenue of the Arts in Center City contains many restaurants and theaters, such as the <a1_0>Kimmel Center for the Performing Arts<a1_0/>, which is home to the Philadelphia Orchestra, generally considered one of the top five orchestras in the United States, and the <a2_0>Academy of Music<a2_0/>, the nation's oldest continually operating opera house, home to the <a3_0>Opera Company of Philadelphia and the Pennsylvania Ballet<a3_0/>. The Wilma Theatre and Philadelphia Theatre Company have new buildings constructed in the last decade on the avenue. They produce a variety of new works. Several blocks to the east are the <a4_0>Walnut Street Theatre<a4_0/>, America's oldest theatre and the largest subscription theater in the world; as well as the Lantern Theatre at St. Stephens Church, one of a number of smaller venues.
